experience.title: Global Strategy Intern
experience.description: Explored synergy with the newly integrated L&T Power Products (PP) division• Increased the IRR by 5.5% by selling 10,000+ addn units in coordination with 4 global sales leaders; reduced the breakeven point by 3 yrs• Improved portfolio offerings by 10% for European clients to meet market demand by combining the PP offer ranges of Schneider and L&T• Conserved $30 million by reforming 4 products in the PP portfolio through benchmarking of worldwide solar power market competitors• Identified potential opportunity of $3 billion in Chinese solar PP market by analyzing the portfolios of competitors ABB, Eaton, & Siemens

experience.title: Strategy and Operations
experience.description: Smoothened the onboarding process for US retail clients in coordination with the Director, Client Success, and Operations• Enhanced client acquisition by 15% YoY via onboarding of 12 US retail clients and deploying playbooks for their advertisement strategies• Saved 80+ man-hrs/month by building a live versatile dashboard for constant tracking and visualization of progress of the US retail clients• Augmented client outreach success rate by 7% by reforming the GTM strategy through analysis of 5 sectors, 250+ brands and 40+ agencies• Delivered business growth insights to increase efficiency by 10% using client report analysis for 100+ retail accounts using CRM database

experience.title: Student Placement Coordinator
experience.description: • Collectively placed 1750+ students (highest till date; 45% YoY growth); achieved 900+ internship offers (highest till date; 51% YoY growth)• Succeeded in converting 13 first-time recruiters and contributed 24 new profiles including 2 international firms and 6 international profiles• Secured a historic 1000+ offers landmark (fastest ever across all IITs) with 71% YoY growth in offers within the first 3 days of placements• Logistics Coordinator: Oversaw scheduling and execution of recruitment processes and served as the sole point of contact for 150+ firms

positions.subtitle: HeadStart RMSOEE Student Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Founding team member of Headstart RMSoEE Student Cell formed to nurture and develop an entrepreneurial ecosystem at IIT Kharagpur• Organised Pitch Battle event in association with Wadhwani Foundation with nationwide participation of 1500+ with 175% YoY growth• Coordinated with 10+ accelerators and incubators for funding and mentoring 27 start-ups functioning under the start-up division team• Facilitated a rise in incubated start-ups by 120% by organizing entrepreneurial workshops, events, pitch battles and internship bootcamps • Synchronized with the Start-up Management team and provided the Start-ups with 50+ suitable Interns for overall Sustainable Growth
positions.title: Head -Events
positions.description_html:
Founding team member of Headstart RMSoEE Student Cell formed to nurture and develop an entrepreneurial ecosystem at IIT Kharagpur
• Organised Pitch Battle event in association with Wadhwani Foundation with nationwide participation of 1500+ with 175% YoY growth
• Coordinated with 10+ accelerators and incubators for funding and mentoring 27 start-ups functioning under the start-up division team
• Facilitated a rise in incubated start-ups by 120% by organizing entrepreneurial workshops, events, pitch battles and internship bootcamps
• Synchronized with the Start-up Management team and provided the Start-ups with 50+ suitable Interns for overall Sustainable Growth

experience.title: Business Strategy
experience.description: -Explored various strategic opportunities for the startup using the Entrepreneurial Strategic Compass framework to guide its decisions regarding customers, technologies, identity, and competitive space.– Developed the Primary Quantitative market research survey questionnaire as a part of the potential market and customer base analysis and Gathered around 250 responses using various Social Platforms.– Devised the preliminary structure for the B2B business plan strategy and analyzed the market for customer choices and segmentation which Assisted in answering Important key questions related to the venture’s products and services to formulate a comprehensive business plan.
experience.description_html: -Explored various strategic opportunities for the startup using the Entrepreneurial Strategic Compass framework to guide its decisions regarding customers, technologies, identity, and competitive space.– Developed the Primary Quantitative market research survey questionnaire as a part of the potential market and customer base analysis and Gathered around 250 responses using various Social Platforms.– Devised the preliminary structure for the B2B business plan strategy and analyzed the market for customer choices and segmentation which Assisted in answering Important key questions related to the venture’s products and services to formulate a comprehensive business plan.

experience.title: Financial Modeling and Investment Apprasial on Dr.Reddy’s Laboratories
experience.description: – Prepared a Business overview Report which includes Financial analysis and SWOT, PEST Analysis along with competitor and Pharmaceutical Industry Analysis in Context to Indian Market.– Implemented data regression to calculate Beta Value (0.35) and Industry Beta (0.92) which helped in maintaining constant Promoters stake of 26% Over a period of the last 5 years.– Financial Ratio analysis showed a significant Decrease in Long term Debt to Equity by 95% and Financials, Industry Analysis suggested increasing stock prices in the near future by 22.7%.
experience.description_html: – Prepared a Business overview Report which includes Financial analysis and SWOT, PEST Analysis along with competitor and Pharmaceutical Industry Analysis in Context to Indian Market.– Implemented data regression to calculate Beta Value (0.35) and Industry Beta (0.92) which helped in maintaining constant Promoters stake of 26% Over a period of the last 5 years.– Financial Ratio analysis showed a significant Decrease in Long term Debt to Equity by 95% and Financials, Industry Analysis suggested increasing stock prices in the near future by 22.7%.
